channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI founders in shopping, maps, and social have a front-row seat to just how fast consumer expectations are rising
item.description: What was good enough six months ago isn't good enough for consumers today.

item.title: Private equity promised an M&A boom this year. The world is still waiting
item.description: Tariff uncertainty has stifled any dramatic surge in dealmaking, despite signs of life in May.

item.title: Informatica CEO: How to future-proof your career in the age of AI
item.description: Employees need to raise their AI IQ and exercise more left-brain thinking, says Amit Walia, to survive workplace upheaval.

item.title: Original Thomas Jefferson letter will hit the auction block on July 4th
item.description: "These are wise words enterprising men quote 'em. Don't act surprised, you guys, 'cause I wrote 'em!"

item.title: NATO leaders want to appease Trump, but spending billions more on the defense alliance ‘would be just crazy for Europeans,’ foreign policy expert says
item.description: The spending target the military alliance just agreed on is unlikely to be met by all countries, but experts say some members are moving to bolster th...

item.title: The era of diversification has begun. Goldman says it has further to run.
